name: The Azzurro Game
description:
A special demo of Level One 'Shakin the Hive' from the upcoming Azzurro Game.

Aliens have invaded and the wasps of the forest have gone into a stinging frenzy! Can the artist AZZURRO and his paint-shooting scarab beetle destroy the mothership once and for all before it leaves Earth's atmosphere? 

Warning: it's not gonna be easy!

Controls included in opening title.
Music has been silenced for the demo. 
Put your own beats on and take on the bug infested alien construction zone as a running, jumping, shooting, sassing street artist!
